attributes.additional_details: Camelot intend to double the cost of a lottery ticket from £1 to £2 therebye doubling their profits. I want this incease stopped and if not the licence to run the lottery given to a more responsible company. £1 a ticket is a fair price. If the distribution of prize money was fairer  there would be more winners and punters would get a fair crack of the whip instead of being ripped off.
